channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #186, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/22 and 12/12
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #186, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/22 and 12/12. Covering 3 weeks the collection is back. This time I fell somewhat in love with the French ttrpg „Cats! La Mascarade“, in which one plays psychic cats that aim to stay hidden doing their new cat order stuff. English Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 2 Post-Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games 3 Science Fiction Roleplaying Games 4 Settings 2 Sourcebooks 6 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 2 D&D 5E Fey Sourcebooks 3 Adventures 6 D&D 5E Adventures 6 Dice Projects 2 Hexaederförmige Würfel Projekte 2 d6 Dice Projects 2 Accessoires 4 Map Projects 3 Deck of Cards 2 Actual Plays 2 Plush & Figure 1 Token Projects 3 Various RPG Projects Spanish Crowdfundings 3 Ergänzungsbände French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 3 Roleplaying Game Translations 3 Sourcebooks Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/12/12/crowdfunding-collection-186/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #186, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/22 and 12/12
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #186, including every tabletop rpg project started between 11/22 and 12/12.

Covering 3 weeks the collection is back. This time I fell somewhat in love with the French ttrpg „Cats! La Mascarade“, in which one plays psychic cats that aim to stay hidden doing their new cat order stuff.

English Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Post-Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games
3 Science Fiction Roleplaying Games
4 Settings
2 Sourcebooks
6 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E Fey Sourcebooks
3 Adventures
6 D&D 5E Adventures
6 Dice Projects
2 Hexaederförmige Würfel Projekte
2 d6 Dice Projects
2 Accessoires
4 Map Projects
3 Deck of Cards
2 Actual Plays
2 Plush & Figure
1 Token Projects
3 Various RPG Projects

Spanish Crowdfundings

3 Ergänzungsbände

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
3 Roleplaying Game Translations
3 Sourcebooks

Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/12/12/crowdfunding-collection-186/
